# Implementation Reports

This directory contains implementation reports generated by the Implementation Agent.

## Naming Convention

`implement_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.md`

## Purpose

Implementation reports document the execution of plans, including all tasks completed, deviations from specifications, and verification results.

## Contents

- Executive summary with task completion status
- Task execution log with detailed operations
- Deviations from plan
- Verification summary (build, tests, integration)
- Issues and resolutions
- Recommendations for follow-up
- Implementation metadata (files changed, commands executed)

## Usage

1. Implementation Agent generates document here after executing plan
2. Validation Agent consumes latest/specified implementation report
3. Documents are retained for audit and debugging
